title: "Fuck your team, they dont exist" -Trick2g
body:
"Help your team, why are you afking top?" -Trick2g

this guy is kinda inconsistent with his "teachings" of the game.

replies.body:
Trick2g drinking game.

Watch his guide videos. Drink every time he tells you to do something and on screen he does the complete opposite.
Empty bottle when he actually follows his own advice.
Trick2G is garbage

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5WGI15Tp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-13T23:28:23.967+0000)

still better than you

not like THAT'S hard to do.

here, have this: http://static2.fjcdn.com/comments/5356193+_98dfd06490438592f54419022898671f.jpg
it's possible that the advice he's giving changes depending on the situation
It's also possible that some people don't understand sarcasm, lol

It's Trick2g.

Do you expect anything else?

I don't think it's inconsistent. When he says "Fuck your team, they dont exist", I'm going to assume he means you can't count on your team to make the right calls, execute their skills correctly, or be anywhere near where they should be. Don't rely on them if you don't have to. However, if they are doing the right thing and have proven themselves competent, that's when the "Help your team, why are you afking top?" comes in.

thats why i hate him and his entire retarded fanbase. a bunch of bronze 10 year olds who spam udyr and nasus "hawhawhawhaw" "MY WAY". pretty much ignoring their team all game then complaining when their team is behind because they didnt have a jungler or top laner for 30 minutes. fucking tools lol. trick2g got to diamond spamming braindead champs and claims to hve game knowledge. i havent watched a single stream without him feeding ASS and then complaining about his team. garbage.

Trick2g is also more of an entertainer where he exaggerates his raging so closet ragers can get some hardy-har-har.
So udyr and voli are braindead champs? Please, go ahead and spam them and come back and tell us when you are diamond

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Rice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5WGI15Tp,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-08-14T02:17:15.690+0000)
>
> So udyr and voli are braindead champs? Please, go ahead and spam them and come back and tell us when you are diamond

you can get to diamond by spamming any 1 champ in the game. udyr and voli are very 1 dimensional champs. voli = you flip someone, you press E+R, you AA, you press W, repeat. 

udyr is probably the most basic and easiest champion to understand AND master in the game. i mean they are pretty fucking easy champs to both learn and master.

the thing about trick is he has zero mechanics. you should notice a pattern with all champs that are his favorites and that he play alot. udyr/nasus/voli. none of these champs have any real hard to learn mechanics as they are all just auto attack based tanks. he typical gravitates towards champions that only require single button clicks and AAing to make use of. if his top 3 main champions were reworked to take actual skill to use or something he would probably fall back to gold/low plat.

Rofl do you even realize how pathetic you sound? You are Silver III with almost 900 ranked games this season and think you could get Diamond?

Udyr is honestly one of the hardest champ to master in this game....he has so many ways to be played and built....even the skill order has to based on every situation and a point in the wrong ability can already fuck him up hard. 
You went 5 12 on your Udyr game and average almost 10 deaths per game on Nasus....easy champs right?

And why do you think you can judge his mechanics rofl...he is Master for a reason, he jungles and lanes vs the best top laners and junglers in NA and duos with Doublelift...hope you actually get better at this game at some point and then come back to read this post of yours again and realize how pathetic and honestly dumb it sounds.

Voli is braindead because that dumbass passive lets him make shitty decisions and not get punished for it. Udyr actually requires a lot of micromanagement and strategic forethought.

strategic forethought yes
Micromanagement No rofl .
You say fuck your team when you can get those 500 stacks by 20 minutes, push to inhib turret, and shit on everyone. Otherwise, you're getting carried and need to act like it.

> [{quoted}](name=The AFK Farmer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5WGI15Tp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-13T23:08:45.968+0000)
>
> You say fuck your team when you can get those 500 stacks by 20 minutes, push to inhib turret, and shit on everyone. Otherwise, you're getting carried and need to act like it.

that doesnt work when your team is getting rofl stomped and knocking on your inhib at the 15 min mark...

Not my fault they are getting roflstomped if i won my lane. Hell there have been (normals) games where I went 9/0 {{champion:122}} in lane while the other lanes completely lost, and refused to roam because i'm not going to carry people who can't win lane in the first place. If they go even in lane or only are slightly behind, yes I will go and help them win. But if they are continuously dying and making the same mistakes, why should I carry them? They are going to say "oh I fed hard but doesn't matter we won and AP {{champion:107}} mid totally works!". They need a loss to force them to look back on their decisions and analyze what went wrong to improve as a player.
Don't really want to be that guy, but maybe that mentality is why you are bronze man. If you are serious anyways.

I specifically specified normals. In ranked I do whatever it takes to win, even if I have to help out people who clearly don't know how to play. But in normals, i'm not to worried about the overall game, i'm worried about my personal performance AKA laning against my opponent, I couldn't care less about roaming so long as I am personally doing well. It seems to work, the only times I outright lose my lane hard is when I get matched up against the occasional misplaced Plat 3.

I also play on locked camera and my main toplaners {{champion:75}} {{champion:122}} are pretty shite at roaming even when fed, so leaving lane tends to be wasted time at best and an ambush -> death at worst.
If you can't see what's wrong with that then I won't waste my time explaining it to you.
did you actually assume trick2g is legit?

He lost to Dunkey. 

Neff said.
Wasn't the conditions first to two kills? I'm guessing you only watched the shortened clip.

i think you are misinterpreting what he is saying

when he says fuck your team, he is talking about constantly checking their kda's or looking them up on lolnexus, bitching about their cs and complaining why they did or didnt do something

hes not saying play the game as if you are alone, and he just means who the fuck cares if your adc fiddlesticks is 2-5-0, play the damn game

Had a game the other night as Elise jg where my team absolutely sucked at decision making. We were behind for most of the match, except for dragons. All they wanted to do was TDM mid. And despite the other team losing bot lane hard, they nearly won the match several times because they had a fed Riven and a fed Annie thx to Jax and Viktor.

In team fights we would just get destroyed because of all the CC (Riven, Annie, Maokai, and Morgana is a shit ton of CC). But they just couldn't comprehend that and screamed about how I wasn't helping and were going to report me, despite the fact that ever time we tried to team fight it was just a route.

So I muted them all and went to split push. This was the 44 minute mark. Elise wrecks towers with maxed W btw. We're talking Jinx-level tower destruction. I pushed in top, then mid, then bot, and then got a double kill in their jungle, which forced the rest of their team to come bot, allowing my team (what was left of it because half of them were dead again) to finish. 8 minutes. That's how long it took me to push all 3 lanes and win the game.

And then I got flamed in post game chat by our shit-tier Jax that fed Riven on how Elise can't split push or wave clear. Fact: I had more CS than anyone in the entire game. I had the 2nd highest gold count in that game. I had the least deaths in the game. Got an S rating.

In bronze your team cannot be counted on to do anything like ward, apply map pressure, help secure objectives, just hold their lane, or even have any idea how any particular champ does or does not work well. Dragon may as well not exist for many teams. You can get a Penta and they'll just sit in lane farming instead of secure Dragon or Baron. And this is all assuming you don't get an intentional feeder, afker, rager, disconnect, etc.

So yeah. If your team doesn't know what they are doing and just want to TDM vs a fed Riven supported by never-ending hard CC, fuck them. Go gates. If you're winnig the team fights, then sure you can push mid as a group. Just watch for the back-door.

3 pages of discussion and none of you have actually hit the target.


trick2g is a White boi who wishes he was a Black gangster, he says shit like this to seem badass and controversial like Slim Shady



He is a good player and his decision making is brilliant, but he needs to drop is cringeworthy persona.
If you've seen him off-screen, he's pretty quiet and polite. His "persona" is what his fans have come to expect and what gets people excited in his channel.

It isn't inconsistency. What trick2g says depends on what champion he is playing and what build he is using. We all know trick has multiple builds for Udyr. Some of those builds are specifically designed to say "fuck your team" and split push while others are more useful for helping your team. Also, when he plays junglers like wukong, he has to help his team because he is a team fighting champion. So he says to help your team in that scenario. 

If you are going to say he is inconsistent, you have to show him using the exact same build while saying "fuck your team" one game and "help your team" another game. Even then, this can be argued because if your team plays terribly, you will need to adjust your strategy because it will be harder to split push.
He's a 13 year-old white boy who thinks he's a gangster. What do you expect?
Still the most entertaining streamer to watch
He is a udyr player why does he need a team lol

Not the best player, but certainly better than the majority of the people playing this game. My issue comes from his fans who have ZERO idea how to actually play the champions like he is. My friend and I were playing some ranked yesterday, and on the other team had a trick wanna be on their team. Saying in all chat "lata," dropping the "disrespect," ect. Problem was, he was awful. You knew he was going devour, and just kept scuttle control, warded up his jungle and made picks, and just in general made his life hell. Of course he blames his team when he's by far doing the worst, when he had no objective control, didn't apply pressure to lanes, and never warded. 

Obviously Trick is better than some mid level Gold player, but the people watching him have little idea how to actually play the game quite often.

You cant play everygame exactly the same, what he actually tries to teach is decisionmaking in his videos.
Also your playstyle will change in different elos anyway, low elo pubstomping on smurfs in silver or playing on your main are 2 completly different things.
And he is pretty good at analyzing the match and making the right plays ( even though he still fucks up badly sometimes).
"The key to learning the game is knowing the game" - Trick2g

If my team doesn't exist, who is feeding enemies?

PS. Trick sucks and so his attitude.
